title: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500, Nasdaq fall to four-week low as investors weigh bank earnings, inflation data - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500, Nasdaq fall to four-week low as investors weigh bank earnings, inflation data  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks fell Thursday to cap another losing week on Wall Street as investors digested a flurry of bank earnings and reeled from the another red-hot inflation report released earlier this week.
